message: I have a great product that I think you'll love, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $165.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $165, but I'm willing to give you a slight discount to $155. It's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to give me a discount, but I'm still not comfortable paying $155. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product.
